## üîí Bitcoin Is Honest, Not Moral ‚Äî And Why That Matters

Bitcoin is often described as ‚Äúethical,‚Äù ‚Äújust,‚Äù or even ‚Äúmoral.‚Äù These claims miss something more important. Bitcoin is not moral ‚Äî it is honest. And that distinction explains both its power and the discomfort it creates. Like a witness that cannot be bribed, Bitcoin records reality without judgment. That honesty reshapes responsibility, sovereignty, and civilization itself.
